title: Schematic diagram (air flow routing)

steps.text: When tightening the hose clamps, carefully ensure that the tightening torque of 3,5 Nm is adhered to. Note: It can only be guaranteed that the intake system is leak–free and will thus operate safely and reliably if the hose clamps are tightened to the specified tightening torque.

torqueValues.component: When tightening the hose clamps, carefully ensure that the tightening torque of 3,5 Nm is adhered to. Note: It can only be guaranteed that the intake system is leak–free and will thus operate safely and reliably if the hose clamps are tightened to the specified tightening torque.

warnings:
Prior to installation,
clean any contamination (grease, oil etc.) from the air intake pipe
and the connection pieces.
notes:
When tightening the hose clamps, carefully ensure that the
tightening torque of 3,5 Nm is
adhered to.
 It can only be
guaranteed that the intake system is leak–free and will thus
operate safely and reliably if the hose clamps are tightened to the
specified tightening torque.
